Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Establishes pricing restrictions for certain contracts involving care package vendors
Summary: Establishes requirements for certain contracts involving DOCCS and third-party care package vendors; prohibits vendors from charging more for a product than the price of the same or similar item in the commissary plus actual shipping costs.
LawCode: Add ยง396-mmm, Gen Bus L; amd ยง112, Cor L; add 165-b, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the correction law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing pricing restrictions for certain contracts involving care package vendors
